subject: United States Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Samuel Henry Ball, known since childhood as Errie, was the last survivor of the 72 players from the first Augusta National Invitational Tournament in 1934.
snippet: Samuel Henry Ball, known since childhood as Errie, was the last survivor of the 72 players from the first Augusta National Invitational Tournament in 1934.
